wikipedia_page.main: Phil Cordell (17 July 1947 – 31 March 2007) was a British musician who released a number of records in the late 1960s and 1970s under several stage names, most notably as Springwater and Dan the Banjo Man. He was a multi-instrumentalist and usually played all the instruments on his musical recordings.

response: * Springwater, a pseudonym for the musician Phil Cordell
*Phil Cordell, 59, British musician, 1971 hit as Springwater.
